hanzi-su-wiki:
練

Значения

Шлифовать, совершенствовать, тренироваться; совершенствоваться

Мнемоника

Искажено. Справа — делить 八 пучок 束, т.е. вытаскивать из него прутья. Выбирать 柬 из чана вываренные коконы для превращения их в нитки 糸 — работа подмастерья.

Варианты

練, 练
purpleculture_pinyin:
liàn
variant of 練 |练 , to practice; to train; to drill; to perfect (one's skill); exercise; variant of 練 |练 , to practice; to train; to drill; to perfect (one's skill); exercise
вариант 練 | 练, на практике; тренировать; сверлить; совершенствовать (свое мастерство); упражнение; вариант 練 | 练, на практике; тренировать; сверлить; совершенствовать (свое мастерство); упражнение
rtega_mnemonic:
練練RS
练练		practice, drill, exercise, train
  • practising 東/东 tai chi lines 糸/纟 in the morning outside/practising writing lines 糸 to write a letter 柬
purpleculture_info:
練 (Trad.: 練)
Pictophonetic: 柬 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 柬 [ jiǎn ] card, letter, invitation, note
heisig_chinese_memo: Spidey stays on the east side of the city to practice. The West Side is too dangerous.
heisig_constituent: practice, thread, spiderman, east, tree, wood, sun, day
Keyword_KANJIDIC: practice, gloss, train, drill, polish, refine
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: практика, глянец, поезд, дрель, польский, уточняют
koohiiStory1: You practice your Japanese skills in a discussion thread with lots of people from the Far East (since many of the people who are interested in studying Japanese are Asian).
koohiiStory2: Spidey stays on the east side of the city to practice. The West Side is too dangerous.
jp_example_words:
練る(ねる): to knead, to work over, to polish up
未練(みれん): lingering affection, attachment, regret(s), reluctance
訓練(くんれん): practice, training
練習(れんしゅう): practice
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Pointing a thread to the east, you practice your navigation skills. You’ve discovered a method to tell direction using just a thread, so you point it to the east in order to find your way. The method takes practice though, so you’re sure to practice every day.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: East is the land of the rising sun, so imagine yourself practicing this method, pointing the thread to the east as the sun rises up. Feel the heat of the sun’s rays and see the bright light as the sun shines up over the horizon.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Also, you are Ren (れん), from Ren & Stimpy the TV show. Since you’re not in the TV business anymore, you’ve decided to practice your other skills. How mature of you, Ren.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you’ve ever seen the show Ren & Stimpy, imagine what it would be like to be Ren. If not, watch a clip on YouTube and pretend you are Ren when you practice doing things, like studying kanji.
Ru_Meaning: practice, gloss, train, drill, polish, refine
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ハ, 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 日 (день), 木 (дерево), 田 (рисовое поле), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese:
liàn: (глаг) практиковать
liàn: (графема) кипятить и очищать сырой шелк; белый шелк; опытный, умелый, тренированный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the Eastern (東) thread (糸) needs polishing up
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spiderman likes to practice by dragging his stuff around on a rickshaw. He lets people put their stuff on top of it and walk behind him too.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸" to " Cambodia " sound. The original meaning is to cook raw silk or fabrics to make them white and soft. "Shuowen": "Practicing, shining." "Shiming. "Shi Caibo": "Practicing, rotten, and boiled." Such as "Zhou Li. Heaven official. "Dying people": "Fan dye, practice with violence in spring, Xia Haoxuan, dye summer in autumn, and give merit in winter."

The extension of " training " refers to fabrics that have been practiced. Zhu Junsheng "Shuowen Tongxun Dingsheng": "Yan is called practice, so the silk that has been infused is called practice." For example, "Jijiu Pian": "Long Luoxun practice Su and Cicada." Yan Shi's ancient note: "Practice. Those who are cooked and cooked." "Zuo Zhuan. The Three Years of Xianggong": "Make Deng Liao Shuai a group of three hundred, and be trained for three thousand to invade Wu." Southern Dynasty Qi Xie Tiao "Late ascend the three mountains and look at the capital city": "Yu Xia scattered and became beautiful, Chengjiang was quiet as training."

" Practice " also means white by extension. Such as "Huainanzi. Shuo Lin: "Mo Zi cried when he saw silk training, because he could be yellow or black." Gao You's note: "Practicing, white." "Lun Heng. "Frankness": "For example, you can still practice silk, dyed blue will be green, dyed Dan will be red." Southern Dynasty Liang Wujun "Answer to Xiao Xinpu": "Pan Pian flowing waterwheel, Xiao Xiao drags his horse."

In ancient times, the Xiaoxiang Festival was held thirteen months after the funeral of the parents, and the filial son had to put on the cloth that had been practiced. Therefore, the Xiaoxiang Festival was also called " Lian " or "Lian Ji". Such as "Zhou Li. Chunguan. "Best wish": "The people of Yandian read prayer; pay, practice, auspicious, and take charge of the affairs of the country." Jia Gongyan: "Practicing, that is the thirteenth month of Xiaoxiang, practicing sacrifice." Sun Yirang justice: "Practitioners, what they have received beforehand The service is also because of the sacrifice of Xiaoxiang." "Xunzi. "Zi Dao": "Dr. Lu practiced to bed, courtesy evil?" Yang Di's note: "Practice, Xiaoxiang also."

" Practice " means practice and training. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Chu Ceyi": "Practitioners and rigorous soldiers, used by the king." "Han. "Jia Zoumei Road Biography": "Today, the king of Wu and Chu practiced the soldiers of the princes to drive away the white disciples, the West competed with the emperor, and the Jibei Dudi Festival could not stand."

" Training " means vigorous and capable. Such as "Grandson. "Ji": "Which soldiers are strong? Who are the soldiers to train?" Jin Luji (Part II of Distinguishing Death): "It is wild, its soldiers are trained, and its weapons are sharp." It also means familiarity and proficiency. Such as "Han Shu. "Xue Xuan Zhu Bo Biography": "The rear Jin Jing is the prime minister, thinking about the old grace, two years after the exemption, recommends Xuan Ming to study the grammar, practice the national system, the previous sitting is too thin, you can return to use." Practicing is as familiar as it is, but it is very familiar."

" Practice " means " Cambo " and " Pick " to indicate choice. Such as "The Great Dai Li Ji. "Bao Fu": "When the king has knowledge, he chooses Taigong as his teacher, Zhou Gong as the fu. Before that, there were plans, and then there were concerns. It was to seal Taishan and Zen Liangfu, and go down to the princes. From this point of view, it is impossible to stand on either side. Don't practice." Kong Guangsen added: "Practice, choose." Wang Pinzhen explained: "Practicing is the same as picking the sound." "Han Shu. "Li Yue Zhi": "Practice time, Hou hopes, sullen, extend the square." Yan Shi Gu's note: "Practice, choose."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸" to " Cambo " sound. The original meaning is to cook raw silk or fabrics to make them white and soft.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「柬」聲。本義是把生絲或織品煮熟，使之潔白柔軟。《說文》：「練，湅繒也。」《釋名．釋綵帛》：「練，爛也，煮使委爛也。」如《周禮．天官．染人》：「凡染，春暴練，夏纁玄，秋染夏，冬獻功。」鄭玄注：「暴練，練其素而暴之。」

　　「練」引申表示練過的布帛織品。朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「湅之曰練，故已湅之帛即曰練。」如〈急就篇〉：「綈絡縑練素帛蟬。」顏師古注：「練者，煮縑而熟之也。」《左傳．襄公三年》：「使鄧廖帥組甲三百，被練三千，以侵吳。」南朝齊謝朓〈晚登三山還望京邑〉：「餘霞散成綺，澄江靜如練。」

　　「練」也引申表示白色。如《淮南子．說林》：「墨子見練絲而泣之，為其可以黃可以黑。」高誘注：「練，白也。」《論衡．率性》：「譬猶練絲，染之藍則青，染之丹則赤。」南朝梁吳均〈答蕭新浦〉：「翩翩流水車，蕭蕭曳練馬。」

　　古代父母喪後十三個月需舉行小祥祭，孝子需穿上練過的布帛，故小祥祭又稱為「練」、「練祭」。如《周禮．春官．大祝》：「言甸人讀禱；付、練、祥，掌國事。」賈公彥疏：「練，謂十三月小祥，練祭。」孫詒讓正義：「練者，既期所受之服也，因以名小祥之祭。」《荀子．子道》：「魯大夫練而牀，禮邪？」楊倞注：「練，小祥也。」

　　「練」表示練習、訓練。如《戰國策．楚策一》：「練士厲兵，在大王之所用之。」《漢書．賈鄒枚路傳》：「今吳楚之王練諸侯之兵，敺白徒之眾，西與天子爭衡，濟北獨底節堅守不下。」

　　「練」表示精壯、幹練。如《孫子．計》：「兵眾孰強？士卒孰練？」晉陸機〈辨亡論下〉：「其野沃，其兵練，其器利。」又表示熟悉、熟練。如《漢書．薛宣朱博傳》：「後方進竟代為丞相，思宣舊恩，宣免後二歲，薦宣明習文法，練國制度，前所坐過薄，可復進用。」顏師古注：「練，猶熟也，言其詳熟。」

　　「練」通「柬」、「揀」，表示選擇。如《大戴禮記．保傅》：「成王有知而選太公為師，周公為傅，此前有與計，而後有與慮，是以封泰山而禪梁甫，朝諸侯而一天下。由此觀之，立左右不可不練也。」孔廣森補注：「練，擇也。」王聘珍解詁：「練，與揀音義同。」《漢書．禮樂志》：「練時日，侯有望，焫膋蕭，延四方。」顏師古注：「練，選也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「柬」聲。本義是把生絲或織品煮熟，使之潔白柔軟。

Main pronunciation 主要发音: liàn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to practice.

English senses 英语理解: to practice, drill, exercise, train

Usage example 用法举例: 練習 liàn xí (practice)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1116

Shuowen 说文解字: 湅繒也從糸柬聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 練 older 練練 from single-thread (纟)糹 mì and (not- 东東 dōng) from phonetic sheaf 柬 jiǎn A159 练[練] new-char 练.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Simplification rule : A159 练[練]

Simplification rule explained :
new-char cursive 柬 not 东東

Variant rule : C000

Variant rule clarification :

Applied rules : R04 纟糹糸

New font rule :

There is no known oracle characters found. 没.

There is no known bronze characters found. 没.

從「 糸 」，「 柬 」聲。本義是把生絲或織品煮熟，使之潔白柔軟。《說文》：「練，湅繒也。」《釋名．釋綵帛》：「練，爛也，煮使委爛也。」如《周禮．天官．染人》：「凡染，春暴練，夏纁玄，秋染夏，冬獻功。」鄭玄注：「暴練，練其素而暴之。」 「 練 」引申表示練過的布帛織品。朱駿聲《說文通訓定聲》：「湅之曰練，故已湅之帛即曰練。」如〈急就篇〉：「綈絡縑練素帛蟬。」顏師古注：「練者，煮縑而熟之也。」《左傳．襄公三年》：「使鄧廖帥組甲三百，被練三千，以侵吳。」南朝齊謝朓〈晚登三山還望京邑〉：「餘霞散成綺，澄江靜如練。」 「 練 」也引申表示白色。如《淮南子．說林》：「墨子見練絲而泣之，為其可以黃可以黑。」高誘注：「練，白也。」《論衡．率性》：「譬猶練絲，染之藍則青，染之丹則赤。」南朝梁吳均〈答蕭新浦〉：「翩翩流水車，蕭蕭曳練馬。」 古代父母喪後十三個月需舉行小祥祭，孝子需穿上練過的布帛，故小祥祭又稱為「 練 」、「練祭」。如《周禮．春官．大祝》：「言甸人讀禱；付、練、祥，掌國事。」賈公彥疏：「練，謂十三月小祥，練祭。」孫詒讓正義：「練者，既期所受之服也，因以名小祥之祭。」《荀子．子道》：「魯大夫練而牀，禮邪？」楊倞注：「練，小祥也。」 「 練 」表示練習、訓練。如《戰國策．楚策一》：「練士厲兵，在大王之所用之。」《漢書．賈鄒枚路傳》：「今吳楚之王練諸侯之兵，敺白徒之眾，西與天子爭衡，濟北獨底節堅守不下。」 「 練 」表示精壯、幹練。如《孫子．計》：「兵眾孰強？士卒孰練？」晉陸機〈辨亡論下〉：「其野沃，其兵練，其器利。」又表示熟悉、熟練。如《漢書．薛宣朱博傳》：「後方進竟代為丞相，思宣舊恩，宣免後二歲，薦宣明習文法，練國制度，前所坐過薄，可復進用。」顏師古注：「練，猶熟也，言其詳熟。」 「 練 」通「 柬 」、「 揀 」，表示選擇。如《大戴禮記．保傅》：「成王有知而選太公為師，周公為傅，此前有與計，而後有與慮，是以封泰山而禪梁甫，朝諸侯而一天下。由此觀之，立左右不可不練也。」孔廣森補注：「練，擇也。」王聘珍解詁：「練，與揀音義同。」《漢書．禮樂志》：「練時日，侯有望，焫膋蕭，延四方。」顏師古注：「練，選也。」

Main pronunciation 主要发音: liàn

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to practice.

English senses 英语理解: to practice, drill, exercise, train

Usage example 用法举例: 練習 liàn xí (practice)

Shuowen 说文解字: 湅繒也從糸柬聲

練字的基本解释

練
liàn
见“练”。

練字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liàn］
［《廣韻》郎甸切，去霰，來。］
“练1”的繁体字。
(1)煮熟生丝或生丝织品，使之柔软洁白。
(2)白，素色。
(3)练过的布帛。一般指白绢。
(4)泛指丝织品。
(5)练习；训练。
(6)详熟；熟悉。
(7)阅历；经历。
(8)精壮；干练。
(9)漂洗；洗涤。
(10)熔炼。
(11)古祭名。古代父、母丧后周年之祭称小祥，此时孝子可以穿练过的布帛，故小祥之祭也称“練”。
(12)组练、被练的省称。亦借指甲士。
(13)通“揀”。选择。
(14)同“楝”。参见“練花”。
(15)水名。在今广东省普宁县至潮阳县一带。
(16)姓。唐代有练何。见《尚友录》卷十八。

練字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　練； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页932第04
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?郞甸切，音鍊。【說文】湅繒也。【玉篇】煮漚也。【釋名】練，爛也，煮使委爛也。【急就篇註】練者，煮縑而熟之也。【周禮·天官·染人】凡染，春暴練。【註】暴練，練其素而暴之。　又小祥服也。【禮·檀弓】練而慨然。又練練衣，黃裏縓緣。【疏】小祥而著練冠練中衣，故曰練也。練衣者，以練爲中衣。　又?練。【禮·月令】天子乃命將帥，選士厲兵，?練桀俊。【戰國策】?練以爲揣摩。　又選也。【前漢·禮樂志】練時日。　又閱歷也。【前漢·韋賢傳】昔靡不練。【註】練猶閱歷之。　又姓。【廣韻】何氏姓苑云：南康人。　又通作湅。【周禮·冬官考工記·㡛氏】湅絲涗水。

考證：〔【周禮·天官·染人】凡染，春曝練。〕　謹照原文曝練改暴練。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liàn］
["Guangyun" Lang Dian cut, go to ha, come. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "练1".
(1) Cook raw silk or raw silk fabrics to make them soft and white.
(2) White, plain color.
(3) Practiced cloth and silk. Generally refers to white silk.
(4) Generally refers to silk fabrics.
(5) Practice; training.
(6) Familiar; familiar.
(7) Experience; experience.
(8) Strong; capable.
(9) Rinsing; washing.
(10) Smelting.
(11) The name of the ancient festival. In ancient times, the anniversary of the funeral of the father and mother was called Xiaoxiang. At this time, the filial son can wear the cloth that has been practiced. Therefore, the sacrifice of Xiaoxiang is also called "training."
(12) The provincial name of group training and training. Also borrowed nails.
(13) Through "picking". select.
(14) Same as "楝". See "Practicing Flowers".
(15) Water name. In the area from Puning County to Chaoyang County in Guangdong Province today.
(16) Last name. There were practiced in the Tang Dynasty. See "Shangyoulu" Volume 18.

Old glyph
practice
Name meaning
Nothing.
liàn
вм. 练
Radicals: 糸, 東  (thread, east)
Meaning Mnemonic
Pointing a thread to the east, you practice your navigation skills. You’ve discovered a method to tell direction using just a thread, so you point it to the east in order to find your way. The method takes practice though, so you’re sure to practice every day.
East is the land of the rising sun, so imagine yourself practicing this method, pointing the thread to the east as the sun rises up. Feel the heat of the sun’s rays and see the bright light as the sun shines up over the horizon.
Reading Mnemonic
Also, you are Ren (れん), from Ren & Stimpy the TV show. Since you’re not in the TV business anymore, you’ve decided to practice your other skills. How mature of you, Ren.
If you’ve ever seen the show Ren & Stimpy, imagine what it would be like to be Ren. If not, watch a clip on YouTube and pretend you are Ren when you practice doing things, like studying kanji.
